definitions.definition: An elastic material used in clothing, particularly in waistbands and cuffs.
definitions.example: running shorts use elastic to eliminate the need for a belt

definitions.definition: Capable of stretching; particularly, capable of stretching so as to return to an original shape or size when force is released.
definitions.example: The rope is somewhat elastic, so expect it to give when you pull on it.
Demand for entertainment is more elastic than demand for energy.

definitions.definition: Able to return quickly to a former state or condition, after being depressed or overtaxed; having power to recover easily from shocks and trials.
